about.title: 🍜 We Know Your Story
about.story_title: 💭 Lunchtime at the Office - A Familiar Scene
about.story_p1: "What should we eat?" Sarah stares at her phone screen again. After browsing food apps for ten minutes, she still can't make a decision. Colleagues debate for half an hour in the group chat, discussing everything from Japanese cuisine to Italian pasta, but they end up at the same lunch box place downstairs that they've visited countless times.
about.story_p2: After work, it's the same script with her boyfriend. "What do you want to eat?" "Anything's fine, you decide." Two people standing on the street, each scrolling through their phones, but neither knows which restaurant to choose. They miss the prime dining hours and settle for a random place with mediocre experience.
about.story_highlight: Does this sound familiar to you?
about.solution_title: ✨ Foodfate was born to change all this

games.title: Turn Choices into Games
games.description: Remember the excitement of spinning a wheel as a child? We bring that anticipation back to your dining decisions, making every choice a delightful surprise.

understand.title: We Know You Better Than You Know Yourself
understand.description: We remember every choice and reaction you make, gradually understanding your taste. Like an old friend, we always recommend restaurants that touch your heart.

moments.title: Perfect Choice for Every Moment
moments.description: Rush lunch breaks, romantic dates, friend gatherings - different moments have different needs. We know what to recommend when.

features.title: 🌟 Making Food Discovery a Daily Joy

lunch.title: Lunch Break Lifesaver
lunch.description: Only 30 minutes for lunch? Find delicious food within 5 minutes' reach with one click. No more stress about choosing - save time for enjoying great food.

dating.title: No More Awkward Dates
dating.description: "What do you want to eat?" is no longer a date killer. Spin the wheel, let surprise add fun to your date, every time is a new adventure.

learning.title: Knows Your Taste Better Over Time
learning.description: Remember every choice and reaction, just like your most understanding friend. The longer you use it, the more precise recommendations become, always finding food that surprises you.

navigation.title: Found It, Now Get There
navigation.description: Recommending restaurants is just the beginning. One-click navigation takes you straight to your destination. Walking, biking, driving - choose the best way to enjoy your food journey.

group.title: Group Dining Made Easy
group.description: Tired of conflicting opinions when dining with friends? Tell us everyone's preferences, and we'll find choices that satisfy everyone, bringing back the joy of gathering.

memory.title: Food Memories Never Lost
memory.description: That unforgettable little restaurant, that perfect date spot - save them all. Organize your food memories by category, relive wonderful moments anytime.

app_preview.title: 🎨 Modern Design
app_preview.description: Warm orange theme with glassmorphism effects for a comfortable visual experience. Supports dark/light modes for different usage scenarios.

health.title: Healthy Dining Mode
health.description: Integrate calorie and nutrition data to recommend restaurants that match health goals

voice.description: Support voice control, such as "help me choose a nearby Italian restaurant"

travel.title: Multi-language Internationalization
travel.description: Support multiple languages, covering food recommendations in major global cities
